info.title: Shareholder Management API
info.description: API for managing shareholders, installments, and financial operations

tags.name: Main Balance Management
tags.description: APIs for managing the main balance of microcredit system

delete.summary: Delete user by ID (moves to deleted_users table)

put.summary: Update existing member with optional images

get.description: Retrieves a specific installment by its ID
Retrieve a list of all shareholders

post.summary: Create new member with images (all images mandatory)

post.description: Allows investor to withdraw money from main balance
Adds investment from a shareholder to main balance
Records installment payment received from borrowers
Creates a new installment without images

get.description: Retrieves all image paths for an installment

post.description: Uploads images to an existing installment
Creates a new installment with optional images

delete.summary: Delete member by ID (moves to deleted_members and deletes images)

get.description: Fetches the current main balance with all totals
Search installments by member name, product name, or phone number
